content.prompt: The work depicts a battle in which

choices.label: Anglo-Saxons were defeated by Duke William at Hastings
the Greeks won a naval war against the Persians at Salamis
Alexander the Great overthrew King Darius III
Rome was sacked by the invading Visigoths

topic.text: 2.1: Cultural Contexts of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Describe visual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. form.  b. style.  c. materials.  d. technique.  e. content.
